Author: ponzo#9122
Content: hello everybody, I reclaimed my fund according to guide yesterday but my destination wallet still doesn't receive my fund yet. could anybody advise me how long refund takes normally?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @ponzo have you sent the small transaction from old address to new?

Author: ponzo#9122
Content: yes 0.0001KMD I've sent from old to new

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @ponzo is the amount less than 7777?

Author: ponzo#9122
Content: yes

Author: ponzo#9122
Content: should I reclaim once more?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: send all funds from old to new

Author: ponzo#9122
Content: okay i'll do it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i have not processed yesterday yet

Author: ponzo#9122
Content: i'll transfer all from old to new

Author: ponzo#9122
Content: sould I reclaim again after that?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the more times you submit a claim,the LONGER it takes

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: only the addresses with a single claim that does the tx from old to new is processed automatic

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: once there are multiple claims, then it needs to be manually processed and added to the END of the queue

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the more you change things, the LONGER it will take

Author: ponzo#9122
Content: okay, thanks for explanation I'll wait

Author: ponzo#9122
Content: my remain KMD in old is less than 0.0001 transaction fee so I can't transfer remain all from old to new

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @ponzo dm me the old address, I will check
